document.full_text: prime minister vladimir putin said on friday that russia will not consider lifting a ban on european union vegetable imports until it hears from the eu about the source of a deadly e.coli outbreak.
document.title: russia awaits eu explanation on e.coli: putin
lines_and_colors: prime minister vladimir putin said on friday that russia will not consider lifting a ban on european union vegetable imports until it hears from the eu about the source of a deadly e.coli outbreak.
